translation: Even here in this world, those whose minds rest in reality overcome birth; Brahman is indeed spotless and real; therefore they are established in Brahman.
commentary: 5.19 Ih here? Eve even? Taih by them? Jitah is conered? Sarga: rirth or creation? whose of whom? Equality in eality? established established? Mind mind? Flawlessly spotless? Hi indeed? Samm eal? Brahma Brahman? Therefore therefore? Brahmani in Brahman? And they? sthitaá¸¥ are established.Commentary When the mind gets rooted in eanimity or evenness or eality? when it is always in a balanced state? one coners birth
